title: Lakshmi Devi Temple Jhumka Earrings with South Sea Pearls
materials: South Sea Pearls with excellent luster and round shape
crafted with traditional Hyderabadi Polish for an enduring sheen.
features: Intricately designed Temple Jhumka earrings featuring a central Lakshmi Devi figure, meticulously handcrafted with Nakshi work. The circular frame is adorned with sparkling cubic zirconia set in a pavé style. Three South Sea pearls dangle gracefully from the bottom, enhancing the traditional elegance. The jhumkas have a secure screw-back closure for comfortable wear.
colors: and iridescent gold South Sea pearls create a sophisticated and timeless color palette.
occasions: Perfect for traditional South Indian occasions like weddings (pellilu)
and significant life events. Suitable also for formal gatherings or to add a touch of heritage to contemporary outfits.
description: These Lakshmi Devi Temple Jhumkas embody the rich cultural heritage of South India. The intricate Nakshi work, the presence of Goddess Lakshmi, and the lustrous South Sea pearls make this a powerful and auspicious piece. Handcrafted with the highest quality materials and the expertise of Hyderabad's finest artisans, these earrings are a timeless investment. The timeless design will definitely fetch you compliments.
